comments: Would of given 5 stars if it wasnt for the 300 energies as it doesnt go very far, would be better if it refilled twice a day instead of once. Why do you have to spend money on special scenes they should be unlocked if you picked the right choices not pay for them. Apart from that love the story and the graphics are great if these issues could be sorted that would be great

I downloaded this due to the narrative and the reviews, but I am not a fan of this game. 300 energies (30 sentences) is very short I get through it in about 3 minutes and then you wait an entire 24hours for another. I love the storyline and the graphics so therefore this would be good for someone who is a slower reader. It's a shame but I will be uninstalling.

Wish there was more energy or like an easier way to get more energy. I get 450 energy for the day with the initial 300 and playing the mini game which gives 100 and watching the adds which is 50. But it's not enough I feel like I only get about a couple sentences in and then I run out. Maybe if you could play the mini game every hour or two to get the 100 energy and watch the ads around the same time to get 150 instead of waiting 24 hrs it would be better. The story progresses too slowly with that little amount.

The game has me hooked. I'm big on reading so I fly through the 300 energies. I've spent $10 repeatedly, even $20 for energy and it feels like it was gone in the same amount of time as the 300 energies. If you allowed maybe 4 refills a day, it would be amazing, or some other way, maybe to just keep playing the minigame. There has to be something more other than 20 energies for a video once a day. But despite the lack of energy, this game has me so disgustingly hooked. I love it so much.

I think this game is really good. I just have one problem. Even though it says my energy is full, it feels like I have nothing. And also the mini game 100 energy seems to last longer than the initial 300 you receive. If you could fix this taht would be great. And if it's designed like this can you make energy spending more efficient?

This game really addictive!! The only problem is they don't give you enough energy.üòíyou either have to buy energy or play a mini game to get more energy. The highest energy points that you can get is 100. Plus the 30 points if you watch a video. Other than that the game is AMAZING. The graphics are realistic. It has a lot of romance too. You should definitely download this game if you're not bothered about the energy points.

description: Join millions of players worldwide and battle a dark mysterious force intent on destroying the Kingdom!With over 8 million downloads in Japan, this magnificent online multiplayer JRPG's global version is now available for download!Welcome to Logres, an epic fantasy world of magic, knights and goddesses.Fight alongside friends against the malevolent threat, and free the Ancient Goddesses!‚ñ† GAME FEATURES: ‚ñ†Cute AvatarsEnjoy a variety of cute avatars with this anime-style MMORPG! Customize your avatars to look like your favorite anime character to satisfy your inner Otaku!Multiple Character JobsOver 15 different character jobs to choose from. Each job has unique abilities that is helpful in every clash.Endless CustomizationBecome a powerful hero with style. Utilize the looks equipment feature to use items solely for its appearance. Wings, Bear suit, Tuxedo, Grass skirts, - you name it, Logres has it! Strategic GameplayChallenging MMORPG content with powerful raid bosses. Strategize with infinite equipment combinations to create the perfect playstyle for you!Real Time Co-op Quests and Auto Party System Enjoy multiplayer gameplay. Defeat legendary bosses with the help of friends and allies. Need assistance with a challenging quest? The Auto Party System will pair you with formidable allies that will aid you in battle.Engaging Chat SystemNever get bored playing the game. Play and chat with millions of online players through 1-on-1 messaging, party chat, clan chat and world chat.Easy ControlsCrush your enemies with a simple tap. Enjoy optimized touch controls for best mobile gameplay experience.‚ñ† STORY: ‚ñ†The Kingdom of Logres is a world where swords, magic and monsters co-exist. The peace of the kingdom was shattered when an unusual phenomenon emerged. descriptionHTML:
Join millions of players worldwide and battle a dark mysterious force intent on destroying the Kingdom!
With over 8 million downloads in Japan, this magnificent online multiplayer JRPG's global version is now available for download!

Welcome to Logres, an epic fantasy world of magic, knights and goddesses.
Fight alongside friends against the malevolent threat, and free the Ancient Goddesses!

■ GAME FEATURES: ■

Cute Avatars
Enjoy a variety of cute avatars with this anime-style MMORPG! Customize your avatars to look like your favorite anime character to satisfy your inner Otaku!

Multiple Character Jobs
Over 15 different character jobs to choose from. Each job has unique abilities that is helpful in every clash.

Endless Customization
Become a powerful hero with style. Utilize the looks equipment feature to use items solely for its appearance. Wings, Bear suit, Tuxedo, Grass skirts, - you name it, Logres has it!

Strategic Gameplay
Challenging MMORPG content with powerful raid bosses. Strategize with infinite equipment combinations to create the perfect playstyle for you!

Real Time Co-op Quests and Auto Party System
Enjoy multiplayer gameplay. Defeat legendary bosses with the help of friends and allies. Need assistance with a challenging quest? The Auto Party System will pair you with formidable allies that will aid you in battle.

Engaging Chat System
Never get bored playing the game. Play and chat with millions of online players through 1-on-1 messaging, party chat, clan chat and world chat.

Easy Controls
Crush your enemies with a simple tap. Enjoy optimized touch controls for best mobile gameplay experience.

■ STORY: ■

The Kingdom of Logres is a world where swords, magic and monsters co-exist.

The peace of the kingdom was shattered when an unusual phenomenon emerged. Huge monsters started terrorizing the town, the Goddesses were sealed, and a masked man with ancient summoning techniques began causing havoc.

Help release the Goddesses to unravel the cause of this unusual phenomena and restore peace. Take up arms and save the Goddesses in this world of fantasy online RPG!

■ SUPPORT ■

Need help? Send an email to: support@logres-jrpg.com

For news and updates, visit our website and follow us on social media:

Website: https://www.logres-jrpg.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LogresJRPG

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/LogresJRPG

Terms of Service: https://www.logres-jrpg.com/tos

description: Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games!  Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.  This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield!  It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players! *** MULTIPLAYER MODES***  Deathmatch mode benefits:  ‚Ä¢ WORLDWIDE and local.  ‚Ä¢ unique maps of various shapes and sizes.  ‚Ä¢ Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.  ‚Ä¢ Up to 8 players in one game.  ‚Ä¢ Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle! ‚Ä¢ Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!  *** COOPERATIVE MODE ***  Cooperative mode features:  ‚Ä¢ Up to 4 Players in one game.  ‚Ä¢ Chat is available as well! ‚Ä¢ 8 special maps. ‚Ä¢ Hardcore gameplay.  ‚Ä¢ Coins as a prize for top results.  *** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***  In this story mode your character is ‚Äúface to face‚Äù with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!  Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.  New cool features in a campaign mode:  ‚Ä¢ A new training camp for first-timers.  ‚Ä¢ More detailed graphics.‚Ä¢ New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds. ‚Ä¢ Cool new songs‚Ä¢ More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!  Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!  Main Features of a campaign mode:  ‚Ä¢ Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.  ‚Ä¢ A lot of absolutely different maps.  ‚Ä¢ Many types of zombies and enemies.  ‚Ä¢ Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.  ‚Ä¢ Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!  ‚Ä¢ Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.*** SKINS MAKER ***  Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîThis is not an official Mojang app. Pixel Gun 3D is not associated or connected with Mojang AB and its game Minecraft - Pocket Edition. descriptionHTML:
Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games! Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.

This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield! It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players!

*** MULTIPLAYER MODES***

Deathmatch mode benefits:
• WORLDWIDE and local.
• unique maps of various shapes and sizes.
• Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.
• Up to 8 players in one game.
• Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle!
• Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!

*** COOPERATIVE MODE ***
Cooperative mode features:
• Up to 4 Players in one game.
• Chat is available as well!
• 8 special maps.
• Hardcore gameplay.
• Coins as a prize for top results.


*** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***
In this story mode your character is “face to face” with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!
Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.

New cool features in a campaign mode:
• A new training camp for first-timers.
• More detailed graphics.
• New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds.
• Cool new songs
• More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!

Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!

Main Features of a campaign mode:
• Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.
• A lot of absolutely different maps.
• Many types of zombies and enemies.
• Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.
• Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!
• Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.

*** SKINS MAKER ***
Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!

Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!

——————————————————————————————————

comments: It's a good story and all. But I only wish they would let me save up energy or at least give me a little more. It gets frustrating when I can't Carry on, I'm not a patient person. Graphics are good. Controls are good. Story is great! Loving most of this game so far. I just hope they change the energy part of it. Though I guess it's a lot easier to read thn most episode stories.

I love the story Line just like I've been reading in the comments the energy sucks I know it's just to keep us from reading the story so fast an to blow our money on, but if there was another way instead of us waiting for so long for just a little energy it's defently keeping me from downloading another game like this.. it takes so long to receive the 300 energy I done forgot an really not into the story Like I was when I 1st downloaded it.

The story and art art great, like in the other game, and I love the music too.  I have 2 major complaints though: 1. It's not indicated anywhere in the appstore that this is a work in progress (there's currently 4 chapters in English). This particularly bothers me since I bought energy so I could get immersed in the story, only to be torn out of that immersion by an incomplete story. 2. The energy system. I mentioned this in my review for the Drogo one as well, and plenty of people pointed it out here so I won't go into detail.

I think all of these Is it love stories are absolutely amazing. The writing has given me inspiration to read more romance novels. But I don't like the energy system. I foolishly paid a lot of money to read/play longer and I'm glad the author and developers get the money for a product I thoroughly enjoy. I just wish the daily energy was 1000 or something

Amazing story... When will there be more chapters?! I also don't like how I have to buy energy in order to not just have five minutes (maybe) of reading the story and making decisions. Please come out with more chapters soon!

Loving the story so far and the graphics.. It's all so beautiful. Only wish that they would give you more energy over time to read it.. when you lose time to read you lose interest in the story by the waiting. Help us stay interested!

descriptionHTML:
Is it Love? Peter - Vampire is an interactive game (choice game). A game with vampires, Witches, and werewolves.
Like in TV sitcoms, new episodes (chapters) are regularly released. You can download this interactive love game (choice game) for free.
In each episode, you'll have a lot of choices to take in order to make it YOUR story, YOUR romance!

Story:
"Having had supernatural faculties since your childhood, you decided to leave everything to go get some answers at the strange Mystery Spell University. You found a job and accommodation at the Bartholy Manor. In exchange for your services, taking care of the younger sister, Lorie, you live with them. The city's inhabitants fear them terribly, the evil shadow of their father weighs in all consciences ... Many mysteries surround the Bartholy brothers and you will quickly discover that the whole city has things to hide. Many people at Mystery Spell have strange secrets ...
However, only one inhabitant is always on your mind and arouses your curiosity, and that is Peter, the most mysterious and most melancholic of the Bartholy brothers. Will you manage to tame him without putting yourself in danger? Will he confide his darkest secrets...?"

Strong points:
✓ Meet with Vampires and Witches.
✓ It's your game: Your choices influence the story.
✓ A 100% free Otome Game in English
✓ A new visual adventure.

An Otome is a visual novel type game in which you are the heroine about to live true romance (love story) with possible twists (Love, seduction, betrayal, marriage...) depending on the choices you make (choice game)

descriptionHTML:
'Food Truck Chef' was chosen as one of Google Play’s Best Games of 2017!

Cook tons of fabulous cuisines and become a top chef in this addictive time-management food truck cooking game! Download now for free!

Travel across the world and spread the Food Truck craze, something a restaurant could never let you do! Use various ingredients to cook lots of amazing recipes of delicious dishes and desserts like Coffee, Pizza, Sandwich, Cake, BBQ, Burger, French Fries etc…

This fun food truck cooking game has more than 150 new ‘n’ tasty dishes and more than 250 levels to play with, and a dash of challenge at every turn. More cuisines being added all the time!

Upgrade your kitchen appliances to cook quick and fast. Decorate your truck with awesome upgrades to keep the surroundings cool and fun for everyone.

Game Features:
• Unlock lots of cool levels with unique dishes and ingredients.
• Unlock new items to upgrade your kitchen and be a better chef.
• Welcome your customers to your food truck with a new look, customize the look to keep getting more tips!
• Chase whacky achievements.
• Battle it out against other chefs at the Food Truck Carnival
• Play with your friends when you connect to Facebook
• Go on a cruise and try your luck at the slot machine!

Let’s fire up the grill!

‘Food Truck Chef™ : Cooking Game’ is a completely free to play game but some in-game items require payment.

We would be happy to hear from you. Do get in touch with us.
- To know more about the game visit: www.nukeboxstudios.com/foodtruckchefgame
- For feedback/suggestions write to us: support@nukeboxstudios.com
- For latest news, like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/foodtruckchefgame

This game has been conceptualized and developed by Nukebox Studios. Visit us at www.nukeboxstudios.com.

****************************************************************
Game Requirements
****************************************************************
'Food Truck Chef™' respects your privacy, does not store any personal information and does not share this information.

We do require a few additional Permission to function:

- Permission to read & write to external storage
Food Truck Chef™ needs this permission to store your game progress locally on your device.

comments: It's pay to win for sure. However, if you play daily and stick to monthly and quarterly cards you'll rack up gems and heroes quickly. It took me over a year to get my VIP high enough to get the monthly meta heroes. I get an hour or two a day out of it and even when I didn't have the monthly paid heroes I had a fun time. I don't mind spending $15/month for the amount of time the game helps me kill.

I'm a paying customer, which they call "VIP" but you best believe you are far from important. I had an issue with a purchase in December, but support takes a week per message to reply and isn't useful at all about the issue and tells you they can't help. Should have let Google refund the money before the 48 hours instead of giving their support a chance.

Don't download the game . If u want to win u must spend thousands dollars. A huge skins with control every month 2 new heroes with amazing power. Every month making new heroes and the old ones getting trash. Random game no strategy. Just click for pic. Ucool don't do anything. Don't download!!! I played more than one year and every month it's getting worst. The forgetting about players. They think only for cash. Ucool one of the worst organisation..if u don't spend a money please don't start the game .nice pictures  and that it )))

This game was a very well balanced game between free play gamers and those that put money into it. Not anymore. If you want to be competitive you must put handreds of dollars each month (no joke). Very dissapointed in the way this game has become.

A very good game but a pay to win. I myself paid 73$ and I am VIP 8. This game can be fun without paying but to get the most out of it atleast  buy an annual card for 30$. If you have even more to throw away try buying all the cards when they run out get a new one. (Mainly Annual and Season Card. Week card isn't a must have). Also if you are new to the game wait for a new server to start. That way you wont fall behind. I am on server 210 and have also played on server 207. I was in this game when it was brand new and purple heroes were the best. I was in 1 of the 1st servers and f2P I quit the game at lvl 50 though. All in All if you want to play this game prepare 100$

I cannot even use the attack buttons for arenas,and other duels..please fix it..and where is the settings menu..very laggy connection and slow progress.. ID NO. 15698719 I'll wait for your quickest response..

comments: Updated This game has become about how much time and MONEY you can spend on it. They don't care about issues in game or what feed back they get. There are hundreds of issues that don't get addressed they just add more and more content hope people ignore the issues. Thed new content creates new issues and in some cases makes old issues worse

Don't bother. Pay players only do well. And it's expensive! Devs have it programmed for pay players so you fall far behind and can't catch up. They match you against pay players that are always stronger. Contests are extremely difficult. Been playing for 2 years so I know what I'm commenting about.

Ever since the new owners took over, content has lessened. Although new heroes appear, it is all about money scams and contests. Turned down drop rates make it nearly impossible to upgrade with dropping piles of cash.
Used to be a fun game with silly characters and lots to do. Since sold by per blue game quality has plummeted. Deleted and moved on to other games that run smoother and appreciate customer feedback.
The text in game as become tiny almost unreadable since last update. Am I the only one? I'm playing on galaxy S8.

One of my accounts was stolen, I had it connected to FB, Google & Email, I have gotten an email asking for things they need to verify, I sent what I could, name, server, etc, I also sent pics of the name it was when I had it and the name they changed it to, also the guild name, still not heard a thing back? It can't be that hard to get it back, I known a few ppl working in the gaming area, and they say it's pretty easy that you guys probably could care less, as long as you get your money...I really like playing it, I've put money into it, but security is horrible if I can have it connected to 3 things, yet someone can still steal it???.....Very disappointed now.

descriptionHTML:
Battle dragons and monsters in DragonSoul, the epic fantasy RPG stuffed with amazing heroes, legendary monsters and fantastic loot!

Battle online to earn legendary heroes and power-up to brawl your way through multiple fantasy game modes. Roleplay through the many Campaign chapters, test your skills against real DragonSoul players in PvP battles, and take a break from your quest to battle in the Boss Pit! Even team up with other players by joining a multiplayer Guild!

With all new heroes, gear and maps to grind, DragonSoul is a ridiculously fun and epic role playing adventure!

DragonSoul Features:

Strategy RPG with Over-the-Top Battles!
+ Collect and choose your 5 best heroes to wage war against monsters, dragons and even other players online
+ Roleplaying games and campaign battles come with a ridiculously epic twist
+ Strategy is key to beating tougher and stronger opponents!

Battle in Weekly ‘Guild Wars’ Fighting Games!
+ RPG fighting games give you a shot at squaring off against other players
+ Battle dragons and other amazing creatures in updated challenges
+ Multiplayer RPG games allow you to compete against other players for top ranks, prizes and bragging rights

Epic Heroes & Powerful Runes!
+ Heroes have at least 4 deadly skills and 14 rarity levels
+ Collect Heroes to build the ultimate lineup
+ Battle with awesome gear like Laser Kittens, Enchanted Elbow Pads and Lucky Orc’s Foot
+ Legendary heroes get even stronger with the addition of Runes

Battle Dragons & Legendary Monsters!
+ Battle dragons and monsters by fighting in combats
+ Monster RPG becomes real! Strategize with your heroes to battle your monsters in this RPG
+ Heroes clash with epic monsters in battles like you've never seen with unique & awesome gear

Epic Hero Quest!
+ Battle dragons and monsters as you collect Soulstones to free and unlock Heroes from the clutches of the evil dragon, Umlaut!
+ Roleplaying as five main heroes; you’ll battle dragons and grab rare loot

Amazing Graphics!
+ Explore a rich fantasy world filled with gorgeous environments, hilarious characters, astounding effects, and stunning graphics.

Long ago, fearless heroes ruled the land with mighty powers. Then the jealous dragon Umlaut captured the heroes, trapping them in Soulstones. Now, only few heroes remain. Only YOU can take the remaining few on a journey from a scrappy band and turn it into an unstoppable army as you unlock Soulstones in each battle. Explore an original world with fantastic characters while fighting your way to the top, freeing heroes and defeating evil along the way!

Fantasy RPG games will never be the same! Battle with your legendary heroes and become the best in this monster RPG!

Download DragonSoul today!

DragonSoul is available in multiple languages, including: Spanish, French, German, Russian, Italian, Turkish, Portuguese, Dutch, Danish, Japanese, Korean, Chinese and Indonesian.

Simulation and role playing game with countless possibilities!

It’s an exciting and vibrant virtual world! A second life where you can become the person you always wanted to be.
Create your avatar and join millions of other people who already downloaded this fun role playing game!

Dress up your avatar, design and decorate your home. Buy new clothes, discover new, amazing brands and create your own perfect outfit. Be a fashion star and the centre of attention. Go on dates and parties in paradise locations. Show off your dream home. Message new friends. Explore this ever-growing virtual reality 3D world of AVAKIN LIFE now!

• Role playing game and simulation where you can choose your perfect character, figure, hair, eye colour and many more!

comments: I'd really like to give this game a 5 star rating. Their customer service is fantastic. The graphics are great. Lots of missions to go on. And they have events every week. Exactly what I'd be looking for in a star trek game. But the thing I just can't get past is the gambling aspect for role playing. All I want to do is role play as a captain of a galaxy class starship. But after a month of almost daily spins at the Dabo table (including spending real money on the vip pass and dilithium, and rolling multiple times a day) I haven't gotten a single galaxy class schematic. I don't want to play borg, or klingon, or older enterprise (hell, I'd trade all of those for just a generic galaxy class). It doesn't seem fair the game doesn't give you a more direct way to role play as your favorite ship. Isn't that the whole point of a game like this?

Great collections of star trek universe, but the game screams micro transactions and gambling around every corner. The game gives you a great concept that gets hindered by currency gates. Only play if you want a nostalgic taste of star trek themed free to play game

I absolutely love this game! It's concept is (though not entirely unique to Star Trek) cool. I just love the voices for characters and would love more characters to have voices.  For the longest time I was a F2P player, and when Events first started I was constantly in the Top 1000 so don't buy into that "You have to pay to win" nonsense. If you do put money into this game make it the $4 Monthly Dilithium Card it is worth it $4 for 3000 Dilithium if you can afford it.

Don't listen to the haters who say it's Pay for Play and DB is a greedy company. It's bull, no amount of money will get you where time invested into the game will. Oh, and if the game even loads slow for a second DB is likely to send free stuff. If people complain about somthing...free stuff. So I say keep up the great work! One thing though, I'd be awesome if we could name our starbases. Just a thought.

Progress stalls unless you spend insulting amounts of money (dilithium prices are absurd) to get better characters. In the early days of the game you could progress easily, but now I feel as more high-paying players have joined they want you to spend money to progress, and their prices really are absurd. The game is fun, but they're greedy. In the events especially, those who pay more get significantly better awards. A bit disappointing for those of us that have supported the game with occasional purchases from the beginning.

Love everythinggg tho id like to like i want to controle the ship my self manuver it myself open world like eh thats my piont this might change the game and other peoples view/perspective pionts but it would complete my dream of getting the one thing i always love and always will love star trek.üòÅ

descriptionHTML:
Explore the Final Frontier in the ultimate Star Trek™ strategy RPG, STAR TREK TIMELINES. Join Starfleet and save the Alpha Quadrant from temporal anomalies which bring together heroes and villains from all of Star Trek history. STAR TREK TIMELINES is the first mobile game to include ships and characters from the new series Star Trek: Discovery!!

FEATURES 

● ASSEMBLE YOUR CREW from hundreds of characters from Star Trek, The Next Generation, Deep Space Nine, Voyager, and Enterprise, each with their own unique skills and abilities 
● COMMAND ICONIC STARSHIPS, including the USS Enterprise, Voyager, Defiant, a Klingon Bird of Prey, the Borg Cube, and many more
● ENGAGE YOUR ENEMIES in stunning 3D ship battles with exciting PvE play or in PvP Battle Arena where you’ll test your crew’s mettle against the best captains in the galaxy.
● EXPLORE THE GALAXY, gaining influence among a dozen factions, including the Federation, the Maquis, the Dominion, the Terran Empire (TOS: “Mirror, Mirror”), and the infamous Section 31
 ● CLIMB THE LEADERBOARDS and win rare rewards with special event missions.
 ● STUNNING GRAPHICS bring the 24th century to life in the most immersive and thrilling Star Trek experience available

STAR TREK TIMELINES © 2017 Disruptor Beam, Inc. STAR TREK ™ & © 2017 CBS Studios Inc. © 2017 Paramount Pictures Corp. STAR TREK and related marks and logos are trademarks of CBS Studios Inc. All Rights Reserved.

description: Join players around the world in this epic RTS MMO game to reclaim an ancient kingdom on the Arabian Peninsula. You, my lord, are called by the people to take on the great challenge to become the next king in the hope of bringing peace and prosperity back to this land. With more eyes on the throne than you can possibly imagine, you must be strategic and make your claims to resources and troops fast, even if it means war. It‚Äôs time to demonstrate your leadership skills and diplomatic strengths to surpass your opponents in the quest for supreme power. Show them no mercy.Engage in Epic Battles Command the finest troops and fight your way to the top. Strike your enemies hard and leave them far behind. With a powerful army, equipped with the most advanced technologies, you will dominate the world in no time. Explore the Vast Arabian DesertThe desert is fun place, and a dangerous one, too. Go on monster hunts and explore the ancient relics if you fancy the wild. You will find plenty of resources among other useful items. The rewards are worth the efforts.More Resources More ProblemsThe world is watching. Your enemies will find ways to eat into your success. There will be times when allies are needed. Choose your Alliance members wisely, because they may be the determining factor for your conquest to the throne. The War of Throne is not a single man‚Äôs fight. Invite your friends to playThis is a game where you will make lots of new friends. But don‚Äôt forget to invite your old friends to join the fun too. They will share your visions and dream. With more friends by your side, you will be more than you can be. Support:If you have any feedback, please write to us at serviceros@www.onemt.comPrivacy Policy: http://www.onemt.com/policy.htmlTerms of Service: http://www.onemt.com/terms.html
descriptionHTML:
Join players around the world in this epic RTS MMO game to reclaim an ancient kingdom on the Arabian Peninsula. You, my lord, are called by the people to take on the great challenge to become the next king in the hope of bringing peace and prosperity back to this land. With more eyes on the throne than you can possibly imagine, you must be strategic and make your claims to resources and troops fast, even if it means war. It’s time to demonstrate your leadership skills and diplomatic strengths to surpass your opponents in the quest for supreme power. Show them no mercy.

Engage in Epic Battles
Command the finest troops and fight your way to the top. Strike your enemies hard and leave them far behind. With a powerful army, equipped with the most advanced technologies, you will dominate the world in no time.

Explore the Vast Arabian Desert
The desert is fun place, and a dangerous one, too. Go on monster hunts and explore the ancient relics if you fancy the wild. You will find plenty of resources among other useful items. The rewards are worth the efforts.

More Resources More Problems
The world is watching. Your enemies will find ways to eat into your success. There will be times when allies are needed. Choose your Alliance members wisely, because they may be the determining factor for your conquest to the throne. The War of Throne is not a single man’s fight.

Invite your friends to play
This is a game where you will make lots of new friends. But don’t forget to invite your old friends to join the fun too. They will share your visions and dream. With more friends by your side, you will be more than you can be.

Support:
If you have any feedback, please write to us at serviceros@www.onemt.com
Privacy Policy: http://www.onemt.com/policy.html
Terms of Service: http://www.onemt.com/terms.html

descriptionHTML:
Certain that it will help overthrow Sauron and raise himself as a force for good in his place, Celebrimbor has forged a new ring of power. Alongside this ring of power, he has forged a series of minor rings that are bound to its fate and call to Champions across Middle-earth; wage the Shadow War and overthrow Sauron's armies.

Continue Talion's journey through Mordor and wage real-time battles to turn Sauron's army against him with the Champions of Middle-earth and your own personal Orc army.

COMMAND ICONIC MIDDLE-EARTH CHAMPIONS
-Collect, equip, and upgrade iconic characters from Shadow of War and The Lord of the Rings such as Talion, Celebrimbor, Gimli, and Galadriel, all controlled by the new rings of power.

FIGHT REAL-TIME BATTLES
-Battle your way across hostile regions of Mordor.
-Direct your team's combat tactics in real-time and launch powered-up special attacks when it matters most.

AMASS AN ARMY OF ORCS AND NEMESES
-Dominate your Orc nemeses or accumulate a trail of dead. Each Orc you face remembers your decisions, creating a unique experience for every player with the award-winning Nemesis System.

JOIN A FELLOWSHIP
-Strategize with your friends and request/share upgrades to help your journey

BUT if you are not in their beta test group it's getting discouraging that you are not treated as equal as the others and you need to put much more effort and time to get rewards and move along in the levels. Don't start unless you like to be treated with no respect at all

Well the game is great!! This morning when I was using it tho the time it would take for things to be done was reduced greatly, everything was 2 mins, 5 mins, 10 mins and 15, and I was impressed and decided that if its a new update I'd glady play more often. The second time I went back on everything was back to the old time period of production. I was disappointed and didn't bother to spend even 5mins more on it. I believe everyone would find it more exciting to play if the time for production wasn't so long. I hope that this can happen in another update, if not, well I can't do nothing about that.

Gave it a lower rating because I sent 3 messages to support regarding loading error and never received a response just kept sending me to the games web page which was of no help. Very fun game but no support it seems

I love this game! It is my favorite! I like how can earn gems! I love the different 'contests.' However, I tried really hard to get the snowy owl and didn't make it in time. Now I'm not playing as much but still love the game!

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Paradise! Build your tropical island, discover new lands, and trade with friends, merchants, and adorable animals.

Join Keani, Skippy, and the rest of our quirky crew as you create a thriving seaport and restore Paradise Bay to its former glory! Get excited, because life is better at the beach.

FEATURES:
• Create and customize your very own tropical paradise
• Explore and expand your island to unlock its secrets
• Collect long-lost map pieces to discover new areas of the world
• Discover and nurture the island’s animals
• Harvest raw resources and craft valuable goods
• Trade with islanders, merchant ships, and friends
• Buy and sell valuables in the bustling marketplace
• Dive deep and uncover treasures lost at sea

SUPPORT:
Need help in-game? Tap the settings icon located in the upper left corner of the screen and send us a message!
​
NOTES:
Paradise Bay is completely free-to-play, however some items can be directly purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.​

Due to Paradise Bay’s rich 3D graphics and animations, some devices may not be suited to provide an optimal playing experience. If you encounter any problems, please contact our support team using our in-game support option, or at paradisebaygame.com/support.html

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms/en

comments: I think it is a great game and great concept. Then in the stories characters would send pictures and videos. Great except you have to pay to see them. Not pay and boom you see stuff permanently, but its a weekly, monthly, or yearly thing like its a PlayStation plus account. There are ways of making money without doing this, its called advertisements. Yea they are annoying but they work. I would rather deal with ads and experience the full game then have the game be free but I have to pay for parts locked behind a pay wall. Aside from that the game is great.

Well the reason I put a zero on the graphics was bc I didn't get to see them.üò¢ I just wanted to let you know that I want to request a update on the game maybe just like let people see the video chats and not the pictures. It was really hard knowing what it was talking about. Overall I like it!üòÄ

I love these stories because they're  breathe taking, mysterious, juicy, horrifying, gruesome and just amazing. I find clifhanger inspiring because it gives me bazaar ideas for when I want to write a horra story. However, I don't like the idea of paying because when I first downloaded this app I read the first story and while I was reading the story a blurred picture appeared so I was so excited but when I went to click on it, it said I hat to pay which was quite disappointing but other then that I feel like this app was a realy good idea I feel like it was well made well organised and well planned

I understand this would be good entertainment for some, but honestly the set up you have is bad. having to pay multiple time to see a video or anything that is added as an extra is bad enough, having wait time are worse. On top of all of it the stories are lack luster. Please fix it.
I love the app it's amazing. I advise u to download it but pls put ads bc u have to wait 14 mins I mean I'd rather watch ads than wait 14mins it just makes me angry.

Love the whole concept, great how the phone actually rings like someone is calling you. Sadly this main novelty is hidden behind a subscription wall. Advertisements I can deal with but a subscription I point blank refuse.

comments: Like so many other games like this out there it is"pay to win". This is nearly every "free" mobile game it there now. So why the 5 stars? A few reasons. A big one being that they do make the super currency accessible without paying via offers. Many of which rewards higher amount than what someone would come to expect just for making it a fair ways into other games.  Second is that the levelling system is fair and no content is truly locked for those who don't pay. It will just take you a little longer to get what you want if you don't but it won't be excluding you from the best content.   As for the game itself is alright. You collect heroes and you can engage in a variety of activities. From a campaign mode and it's associated elite version to random dungeons to guild wars, pvp, and a gauntlet. Overall you can kill however much time you want on this game. Once you start attaining higher levels you will find it easier to spend more and more time on content.  Finally as always I strongly recommend doing a Google search too learn best strategies.
Thanks for not contacting me back PerBlue. Don't spend any $$$$$ on this rip off game. Gold chest gave me Whirling Dagger shards instead of of the hero first
I'M IN MY BED WITH BIG RED EYES IN SO ADDICTED TO THE GAME
Really enjoy the game. Only problem is,it will not let me in the Dungeon. Can you fix this for me? 5 stars without that problem.
It was really cool. I got interested playing it. I was only on for 20 mins and already on level 10

descriptionHTML:
Enter the world of Portal Quest, the next generation of RPG mobile games! Gather and lead your team of battle-ready Heroes to protect against a corrupt force! The Hollow is poised to take over the World as you know it. It’s up to your team to wage through battles to hold the Hollow back. Your enemies will only get tougher so assembling the best team of battle-ready Heroes is essential. Summon your team to take down the enemy while upgrading them to the finest Heroes Portal Quest has seen. It’s the only way we will be able to hold the Hollow back and defeat them for good!

Features

• Battle Through the Campaign - Earn gear, experience, and shards to upgrade your heroes by taking down the enemy in 5v5 battles.
• Gather the Best Heroes - Collect and upgrade 35+ unique heroes to build out a full team.
• Choose Your Heroes Wisely - Each Hero has its strengths. Use them against the right enemies and you’ll end up on top.
• Compete in Guild Wars - Join your Guildmates and take on other Guilds in epic battles to defend your Keep!
• Tons of Challenging Modes - Whether it’s collecting unique gear from a dungeon or putting your team up against your friends, there is always a battle to wage.


Facebook - facebook.com/portalquestgame

comments: Nice game but the way they select the game players within the same "strenght" is unfair. Because they use infamy to measure your lv but at the same time you can get infamy even when you die in the first seconds of a match. In that way you are obligated to face strong enemies because your team is good enought to win the battle without you. In that case the game delievers a bad experience for the player.

Plz push an update to hide chat button during battles, while battle the screen should be much cleaner with minimum icons on screen or transparent eg weapon icon. Auto on off header which shows ship names icons etc to enjoy the game screen on mobile.  Ship score is added but how know the quality / grade /% over the other strong ships where do our ships stand on that point of the certain ship levels.   Sea texture and colour need to be more improved, i really love the water in the poke'go. The way it appers its great. Plz add weather effects lightings nights Strom snowy etc head lights to ships, Reload animations, ship colour paint jobs decals,

Could you fix the guild rivalry page. After battles when people go to check the quests etc. it does not pull up. Have to exit game and restart. Happens a lot and gets frustrating. Other than that it's a very good game
Good changes, but could you guys bring back the big ol' red BATTLE button? The new one doesn't quite evoke that same 'YAAAARRGH!' feeling of going into battle. Thanks:)

Bear with me here.  How about introducing a pulse that stuns? A yellow item, radius 5, 1 slot point and stun duration probably shorter than the Tesla stun in the respective training level.  OR!  have the fixers pulse gain the ability (training maybe) to stun enemies for like 1-2sec. Same duration as when a Tesla shield is forcefully taken down. (not so sure about the second one, but the first seems good)

I love this game and the fact that all the pictures of the game above aren't hyped up. They are the real game. The game is good and I love being able to select my weapons I'm still figuring the system out completely but it's great overall. The only thing I might ask for is a slightly better tutorial

Join a fleet of allies and take on competitors the world over in bite-sized battles among the rolling waves ‚Äì all while you wait for the bus. Choose A ShipChoose between different classes of ships, each with their own speciality ‚Äì the Enforcer packs a powerful offensive punch, the Defender is a nearly indestructible floating tank, the Shooter can equip more weapons than you will ever need, the Speeder is‚Ä¶ speedy, and the Fixer keeps your teammates floating. descriptionHTML:
Face off against real opponents and own the waves in real-time team battles – it’s sink or win.

A real-time multiplayer battle arena in your pocket. Choose a ship, slap some guns on it and take to the tides with your fleet of teammates to trounce live opponents in five-on-five contests of seafaring strategy and firepower.

Mobile MOBA
The thrilling competition of a team battle arena right on your mobile device. Join a fleet of allies and take on competitors the world over in bite-sized battles among the rolling waves – all while you wait for the bus.

Choose A Ship
Choose between different classes of ships, each with their own speciality – the Enforcer packs a powerful offensive punch, the Defender is a nearly indestructible floating tank, the Shooter can equip more weapons than you will ever need, the Speeder is… speedy, and the Fixer keeps your teammates floating. Level up your ships for more healing, defense, speed, and firepower!

Weapons, Armor, Items, Abilities
Cannons, torpedoes, grenades – Collect, fuse and modify items to almost infinite variations. Choose from an arsenal of destructive or defensive items to fit your fighting style. Whatever it takes to keep you and your team stay afloat.

Get Strategic
Attack your enemies with a full on offensive assault, or play defense and capture the point. With different classes of ships to choose – each with their own unique abilities, and a motherload of weapons, armor, items, and perks, there is plenty of room for a wide range of battle strategies.

Join a Guild
Team up with your friends in a guild and chat with your guildmates while you send your opponents to the depths. Guild leaderboards pit your crew against other bands of blast-happy captains. Who will rise to the top?

Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula

Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy

This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
- This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. After the initial download, additional content will be downloaded and this may include data charges.

comments: Great gameIncredible game. But when you move up in lvls the cost of every detail is ludacris! I've played this game a month and spent good money on it.  I am not into waiting a half a day so I can gain a 5 min advantage, then turn around and do it again. Only this time, just wait longer! .... Or of course you could just spend be re $.... Awesome game... makers are greedy!

I'm not happy that I can only send 20 gold from my accounts to one of my accounts per day. I'd like to send more gold per day. Annoying 2 alliance war battle limit should be gotten rid of. It's annoying, expensive and takes a very long time to reach each level of the game. Overall, it's a good game to play but it can be improved

The last few days this game become completely useless and unplayable. The matchmaking has been tweaked to the point where I'm being attacked by significantly higher players, without even a possibility to retaliate! At the same time when I try to attack in quick match, the level of my opponents is being so high, that I have zero chances winning a simple attack.  I'm thinking about uninstalling this game permanently. When contacted, Zynga employee suggests to spend more money to upgrade my defenses. How is that for "humanly friendly" customer service? Horrible service.
After getting to HQ level 10 it just got so boring.  To be honest don't like the game play playing against other people either.  The play is slanted toward the attacker .  Deleted

Game has a fun, friendly community of players. Load times kinda slow. Occational bugs and glitches. Usually following after updates. Overall though a fun game that has new features added frequently, keeping it interesting.

The game creators could give 2 sh/ts about what is going on .

My phone is not rooted or jail broken, I do not have any hacks installed. I get a message saying illegal program detected by XIGNCODE3. Even after multiple uninstalls/installs, reboots, cache clears. All that time and energy wasted!!!

This is the game I have been searching for. But can't give 5 star because of 2 main reasons. Consume too many data while playing that required fast network and too many bugs... Problems free=5 stars.. What happen? I cannot even play the game now.. I once install and play and later uninstall because of game problem. Now I install and try to play again. I cannot play.. What is the problem? I also want to recover my account too..

Gameplay and graphics is great BUT as you progress you spend more time upgrading units and buildings. Some upgrades take up to a week of upgrading rendering those villagers useless aswell as the rate at which resources comes in as you collect doesnt compensate enough for the costs of upgrades. Its unnecessarily STRETCHED OUT. because of this its a 3 star rating...DONT DOWNLOAD IF YOU HAVE NO PATIENCE. Been playing a year and i dont feel my progress is a representation of the time i have put in. Been playing almost daily!

This is the exact definition of a strategy game, the controls are great and its free. You get to choose your own nation which just adds to the strategy, plus whatever you do in a battle can affect the entire battle. I would recommend it to people who want something with strategy and a bit of hardcoreness. The learning curve is quite steep sometimes.

descriptionHTML:
Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!

BUILD a unique village of your own design. LEAD loyal citizens from the dawn of antiquity to the modern era. BATTLE cooperatively and competitively with players from across the world. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!

Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.

DOMINATIONS FEATURES:

GREAT LEADERS!
• At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.
• Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!

BRAND NEW EVENTS!
• Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.
• Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!

FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE
• Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.
• Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.
• Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.

CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY
• Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.
• Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.
• Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!
• Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.
• Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!

DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES
• Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!
• Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.
• Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.
• Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger.

FORM AN ALLIANCE AND WAGE WORLD WAR
• Put your powerful Nation to the ultimate test in PvP combat and raid your enemies’ cities for huge bunches of loot!
• Battle for crucial resources, untold wealth, and total world domination.
• Team up with other skilled rulers and forge an unstoppable Alliance.
• Unleash the full force of your armies with a unique battle strategy to outwit and outlast your opponents in 50-on-50 Alliance warfare.
• Conquer the globe in World War and take home the spoils of war!

Build one of history’s greatest civilizations and develop a battle strategy to conquer opponents. Join an alliance and achieve world domination in DomiNations!

Download now to start building your civilization

NOTES:

A network connection and iOS 7 or above are required. DomiNations is optimized for iPads and iPhones generation 4S and newer. Playing on an iPhone 4 may result in slower performance and increased load times. The game is free to play, with additional purchases available in-game. If you do not want to make purchases in-game, please disable in-app purchases from your device settings.

Privacy Policy:
https://www.nexonm.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
https://www.nexonm.com/terms-of-use/

6121 Hollis Street
Emeryville CA 94608

recentChanges: v6.2 Update Notes
- Expand your civilization with 15 new spaces to explore!
- Upgrade your University to level 7!
- Research Haile Selassie‚Äôs skill tree at the University to improve your late-game combat defenses.
- Harness the power of his Capstone, Lion of Judah, unlocking the ability to build a Rocket Arsenal to defend your base!
- Town Center now has increased white radius where defenders are triggered.
- Japanese Town Centers features an additional yellow ring to show its firing range.
summary: Battle strategy game: Build an empire, wage war & conquer nations across history
title: DomiNations

comments: I love all the Is-it Love stories, they're fun and a great distraction. My only complaint is that there isn't enough free daily energy! You only get a teensy bit of the story every day, which is maddening. There should be loads more ways to earn energy, especially like the mini games.

Matt seems like kind of an asshat in Season 2. She should just dump him. Could do way better. Like with Daryl perhaps? He obviously cares for her wayyy more than Matt does. Matt only has eyes for Lana. Like he says he loves our girl? I don't think so. I wish you could choose somebody else to date.

Energy is too short & there isn't anything other than a side game for 100 more points to keep you entertained. The app is basically a story with a couple of nice artistic pictures.  Way over priced. You can buy a book for less at Barnes and Nobles and still get twice the amount in content. The the amount of money they ask for engery in this game is ridiculous. Don't be silly  and spend money that you can do better with. Just play for free or not at all.

I think it's a good game but... Let's be fair you don't get to play for long each day before you run out of energy and have to wait 24 hours and even then it's only a few minutes play.... The lack of play time makes me loose all interest in what I believe might be a decent game

So. This is an addictive store. The main characters are very well thought out. A few Grammer error and hick ups in game play. Although this game can be expensive if you don't make the right choice. I had bought the same secret scene twice and it still asks me to buy it. This is the second time this has happened. All in all great game.

I find it aggravating that your energy goes down so fast. You get a few seconds of free play per day. I've paid to get more. But I can't and won't keep doing that when even paying for extra doesn't last long. üòí

descriptionHTML:
The second Otome Game (dating game) in our « Is it Love? » series, is now available in English.
Try out this brand new love game with a French Touch!

SYNOPSIS

For three months now, you’ve been working at Carter Corp a company founded by the mysterious R. Carter and based in New York.
You immediately get on well with your work colleague, Matt Ortega. A charming and sweet guy, who seems to always find words that make you smile. You feel extremely attracted to him and have set your mind on seducing him. But the moment you move up a gear, his brother steps in and his arrival may well change things...

This is YOUR story!

You are the heroine of this free scenario game! Beyond simply reading, the choices you make influence the story and its final outcome.
New stories and new chapters are regularly released allowing you to live the love story you’ve always dreamed of.

CASTING

Matt Ortega : graphic designer
Teasing, sensitive, creative, sporty.
25 years old, single, epicurean.
Distinguishing feature : Warm­hearted Bad boy.
Star sign : Scorpio.
“I know, I’m so bright that I light up your days”.

Daryl Ortega : Undisclosed.
Insolent, daring, passionate.
25 years old, single, audacious.
Distinguishing feature : Latino Bad boy.
Star sign : Scorpio.
“Each and every forbidden pleasure is worth living”.

Ryan Carter : Founder and director of the company.
Magnetic, charismatic, guiding, bright, intimidating.
28 years old, single, multimillionaire.
Distinguishing feature : Control freak.
Star sign : Sagittarius.
“Miss, there is nothing that I can’t have.”

Mark Leviels : Managing director of a company branch.
Intellectual, ambitious, calm, accessible.
28 years old, work addict.
Distinguishing feature : never without his smartphone.
Star sign : Libra
“Choosing means dropping something. I choose to devote myself to my job.”

Gabriel Simons : Manager
Outgoing, manipulative, insolent, tactile.
28 years old, single, “serial lover”.
Distinguishing feature : Uses his seduction asset.
Star sign : Leo.
“ I fought to get where I am. I know how demanding one must be.”

Cassidy Sparke : Human Resources manager
Cold, haughty, social climber.
25 years old, single.
Distinguishing feature : is very self­confident.
Star sign : Capricorn.
“I can ruin your career with a single snap of my fingers.”

Colin Spencer : programmer
Curt, terse, mysterious;
25 years old, single, somber.
Distinguishing feature : leader of a heavy metal group.
Star sign : Pisces.
“Hey.”

Lisa Parker : secretary
Gentle, sociable, competent, loyal.
24 years old, single.
Distinguishing feature : is always smiling.
Star sign : Virgo.
“On bad days, I look at my smiley post­it and it helps me smile.”

Fantastic illustrations.

The further you go in the Otome game, the more beautiful pictures you will unlock which will illustrate your romance!

But beware of the choices you make! They influence the unravelling of the illustrations and the unlocking of secret scenes! But no worries, you’ll still have the possibility of playing the game or a certain chapter again to unlock the pictures you might have missed!

And much more...

Discover the secret love stories, the new flirt stories and much more.

Follow us on Facebook simply by liking our page: https://www.facebook.com/Is.it.Love.Games.world and stay informed of all our updating news.

Any queries? Any questions? Contact our client support directly in the game’s Menu by clicking on Support or through our website: http://1492studio.freshdesk.com

Free Download

“Is it Love” is a free game. You do however, have the possibility of buying bonus points. You can deactivate your purchase possibilities through your device set-up.

Internet connection required, some additional fees may be applied.

comments: Best game!! Very addictive, Been playing this game for over a year.. although, there are still alot to improve!  I hope the developers will include edit mode in the next update so that the players can rearrange their city..Also, I hope they will also include a 360 rotation of the city and add factories that can also create materials needed in the game like the railroad materials and steels. I am looking forward with this updates!!

Great, but really needs "sell all" function for dealing with store house and "pecial buildings" components.This is a really quality game, looks amazing, works well and has good timed construction projects. However, as others mention it takes SOOOOOOO long to accrue the assets for construction and the mega bucks for expansion. You have to be VERY patient if you are not willing to part with actual cash. An idea might be to offer a conversion of coins to megabuck, maybe get 1 buck in excahge for eg 5,000,000 coins?

I love this game. Just like other reviews say, it is addicting and because there are constant tasks to complete. Plus!..unlike other games, there is no way you ruin out of coins/money. The cities bring in alot. I can't agree with one reviewer that megabucks are hard not come by.  I began with 25 I believe (now at 32) and some of the tasks to complete give megabucks without spending actual money to even purchase some.  All in all, try this game and you won't run bored of it.

Good game but......after a day into it you make no coin. After every level upgrade it pushes the (buy) equipment option. Not to mention every time you level up. You got to.exit out 15 boxes.before you can continue. Good game but, it's a failure on the free to play aspect.  My rating is fair and final. It's a (ok)  game but many better ones out thwre

The new update is great! Really appreciate the chat system. But it could be better... maybe add some functionality to the capital buildings and states.... maybe bonuses to taxes nd pop, loans, and coop science and military missions. The prices of capital building materials is ridiculous. Fixing these will make the state system look more complete.

Been playing for more than 3 years, i lost count. But this is a wonderful game which encourages teamwork and neighbor support. There are barely any paywalls in this game and  if you have hundreds of facebook friends who have this game you can easily get the materials you need to expand your city. No limits so far. SHARE YOUR WEALTH

Tap to keep your cash flow healthy and thriving as you continue building your business, fortune and reputation. Get famous and become the most successful business tycoon in this idle clicker game. Watch as the rich and famous fight for your favor in Cash, Inc.!

Download now to start your own business adventure to fame and fortune!

comments: I love this game. It's very dynamic and the gameplay is good too. The only problem I have is every single time I do PvP... It pairs me with an opponent far greater than what I can hope to beat. Sure, that's great for improving, but it disheartens me and makes me feel like a horrible player when I can't even beat ONE PvP opponent, ever, while playing the game. I would suggest to the devs that the matching system be a little more flexible when pairing. Give us a matching system that will actually give us lesser prepared players too so we can have the fun of winning, as well. Also, I am disconnected every single time I do PvP battles and bounties. Quite unstable, unfortunately.

Amazing shooter game, awesome hero collecting game, great multiplayer game. Definitely suggest that you at least try it out. But one thing you should look out for, it's pretty easy to sink between 5 and 20 dollars a week into this. Sometimes even 40 to 60. But, it's pretty free-to-play friendly if you can't afford to buy some gold.

I really like the game. It's fun and has enough activities and quests to keep you occupied for a while. My only complaint is how they match people up for the PVP missions. Sometimes you get matched up with people with far higher power and Team level menu which makes it nearly impossible to win. other than that I really enjoy the game

Super fun game. I haven't got bored of the game because there's always events going on which is good. One of the better if not the best shooting game I've played. I think there is a slight glitch when using Steele. Sometimes after I activate his open fire skill he doesn't shoot when I press the shoot button.

Latest update definitely made the game harder. I used to run 4 gauntlet levels with little issue but now I can't get through 1 without losing people. Resurrected characters are completely unwelcome and unfair in pvp when you tell on kills for money. Probably going to uninstall, you're welcome for the money Hothead

Starts off ok but then the pay walls creep in and you are constantly bombarded with prompts to spend money. The PVP is absolutely pointless, highest power rating wins every time without exception so you know if you've won or lost as soon as it picks an opponent. Needs a lot of work before I'd consider dropping any real money on it.

descriptionHTML:
A Dark Fantasy, Collectible RPG

[Google pre-registration]
**Google pre-registration rewards will be sent to users who log in by April 6, 2018(PDT).

Darkness has overtaken the realm, and the world is in chaos. The only hope to restore light and order lies with you, an Heir of Light. Embark on a crusade to renew a hope that has been lost for generations. Ready your weapon and journey to restore the light of the world!

[Features]

■ Be a Light in the Darkness
- Shine light upon a world shrouded in darkness. The war will only end when light shines upon every inch of the land.
- Expand the territory in any direction you desire!
- Mobs are no longer in your way, Exclusive Boss Battles Only!

■ Collect Masters & Servants
- Form your Crusade among 5 Masters and over 100 Servants.
- Enhance, Evolve, and Awaken to unlock their true potential.
- Diverse Roles for each Masters & Servants: Attack, Defense, Support, Healer.

■ Devise and Strategize
- Your Master is the key of your Crusade, customize your Master's Skills for every battle.
- Unleash Combo Skills powerful beyond measure with perfect Master and Servant pairings.
- Customize your Rune Combination to gain unique Set Effects.
- Couple the various different Skills and Elements to assemble the most strategic Crusade.

■ Heed the Savage Battlefield
- Pulverize your opponents in PvP mode to prove your power.
- Preserve your Towers! Defense is the first step in strategic combat.
- Challenge yourself to various dungeons and earn rare rewards. Godspeed!

■ An Eerie and Mysterious World
- Not just another RPG! Immerse yourself in a magical and mysterious fantasy world.
- Cute yet bizarre, uncanny yet charming! Masters and Servants are ready to accompany you on your journey.

* Heir of Light Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/HeirofLightGAMEVIL
* Heir of Light Official Forum: https://m.gamevilusa.com/forums/forumdisplay.php?1896-English

▶Required Permission Guidelines
When using the app, we may ask permissions for access to provide the following services.

[Required Permission]
- Storage: The authority is required to store game data and will not access personal files such as photos.

[Optional Permission]
- Phone: The authority is required to proceed with in-game events and rewards and will not affect calls.
- Contacts: The authority is required to sync your friend list and Google Account.

** This game is available in English.
** There may be additional costs when trying to obtain certain items.

* GAMEVIL Official Website : https://www.withhive.com
* GAMEVIL Customer Support: https://m.withhive.com/customer/inquire

Terms of Service: http://terms.withhive.com/terms/bridge/gamevil.html
Privacy Policy: http://terms.withhive.com/terms/bridge/gamevil.html

comments: I love everything about it!!! It's been a long time since I've played RPG other than my PSP which was almost more than 5 years back. I missed playing games like this so much and I must say this game brings back memories when I played Naruto crazily. Brings the crazy inner gamer out! So yes! I love this game! Thank you‚ô° And everything is perfect too!

It has: 1.Waifus 2.Badass combat 3.BEWBS 4.Cool gears 5.Cute beautiful graphics 6.Fun, REALLY FUN gameplay 10/10 will keep playing. One problem that have occured for some time, there's no more english subtitles. I don't know what will be the reason for that, but please bring it back. The cutscenes are not useful if you can't understand it.

Its got amazing graphics and great gameplay..but when i close the game for a short time and reload it..the screen always goes black and nothing loads. Ive already tried force stop and unstalling and reinstalling it and 80% of the time its a black screen! Please fix it!! It's certainly worth 5 stars if it loaded 100% of the time! Thanks :)

Best app ever. I really like It but one problem. Can you please allow spaces on the name like  *Otaku world*  Because it would be more better :D  And I like All the character's and the kawaii Ai chan :3  I really do like this game. I love anime and I love how you can chat with your friends. But if you touch the person in the menu like when you touch the Tummy when your on to the next heart. Can she PLEASE say *Baka! I would really love it if there was an option to log in using my email account because I don't use Facebook. I'm really scared something might happen to my game progress.

the game is almost perfection, however there are still room for improvement on minor details, like font and in game description as most of the description are cut off half way if too long. also events should be roll out more timely than to throw you ll at one there's too much to focus on. overall the game is great.

descriptionHTML:
New Update—The Wolf's Dawn Awakens

[Game Description]
“Honkai, the mysterious power that has destroyed human civilization many times before has now descended once again on this beautiful world—”
With the lands now crawling with deadwalkers and Honkai beasts, a group of girls bearing the burdens of despair continue their fight onward. Will there be any hope of clinging to survival?
Players will take on the role as captain of the mighty battleship Hyperion, commanding an elite team of Valkyries in battle against the Honkai in a variety of stages, experiencing different storylines, and fighting for all that is beautiful in the world!

[Update Features]
[Wolf's Dawn Awakened Form]
Covered in the white of snow, the Hyperion’s undefeated Silverwolf of the Urals takes on a new form as she is awakened.
Steeped in violence, was this life meant to be one of eternal solitude and killing as a weapon?
Could admitting the former self lead to rebirth at dawn?
Bronya’s awakened forms—Rank S [Black Nucleus], and Rank A [Wolf's Dawn] join the fight!

[Dormitory Party - Time to Move In]
Would you like to decorate a dormitory and interact with the cute Valkyries up close?
St. Freya Real Estate Co. is proud to announce the opening of the Valkyrie Dormitory!
Choose from a variety of styles and move in right away!

[Select Dreamland]
Who… who am I?
This action figure-like creature, have I seen it before? I can’t remember…
That lonely, cold, dark past… was it all just a dream?
Captain… Please use the Bronya’s power to help Bronya to escape from the prison of her dreamland.
The Bronya of the present cannot be lost to the Bronya of the past.

[Chapter 5 Now Open]
Bronya secretly followed Theresa into the Schicsial’s data center, and what appeared before her eyes was the snowfields of Siberia in the year 2000.
The bonds of blood, selfless sacrifice, and fate are all reunited.
A new story and a new enemy waits for captains to explore and battle!

[Support]
If you encounter any problems while playing Honkai Impact 3, please contact the support center in-game and send us your feedback!
Player support links:
honkai3rd_asia@mihoyo.com

Official website: http://asia.honkaiimpact3.com/
Official Facebook fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/HonkaiImpact3rd
recentChanges: 1. New characters [Black Nucleus] and [Wolf's Dawn] join the battle.
2. New Extra Chapter "Bronya - Select Dreamland."
3. New collection of weapons and stigmata.
4. New Final HOMU Fantasy event stage.
5. All new ‚ÄúValkyrie Dorm‚Äù game feature.
6. Opened Chapter 5 of the main storyline.
summary: Life is reborn as the Wolf's Dawn awakens!Attack the Honkai and save the world!
title: Honkai Impact 3

description: Who will win this epic war to determine the fate of the galaxy? Take control of your forces, build bases and fight for your very survival in this real-time military strategy game.Battle for the Galaxy is a real-time space MMO game in which you have to build your base, create an army, attack enemies, earn medals (if you battle well), and steal enemy resources. The gameplay features futuristic units and buildings and beautiful 3D graphics. To start with, you must build up your economy and create buildings to improve your resource generation. Once you have created resource gathering structures you can look to building an army and upgrading your tech.Using the troops you build you can attack enemy bases to steal their resources an earn XP. Make sure you build a variety of different troops to take on the enemy walls, defences and structures. For example, standard foot soldiers can soak up damage whereas grenadiers need cover and are perfect for shooting at defence turrets. Continue to upgrade your buildings, gather resources and create an impressive and varied army. Can you conquer the galaxy?Features‚óè PvP with elements of tower defense‚óè Participate in every imaginable kind of wars and get great prizes: win the Leagues, Tournaments, duels and Raids!‚óè Real-time base management‚óè Gather resources and build a strong base with defences‚óè Research troops and create an impressive army‚óè Fight against other enemies for supremacy‚óè Outstanding art and visuals
descriptionHTML:
Who will win this epic war to determine the fate of the galaxy? Take control of your forces, build bases and fight for your very survival in this real-time military strategy game.

Battle for the Galaxy is a real-time space MMO game in which you have to build your base, create an army, attack enemies, earn medals (if you battle well), and steal enemy resources. The gameplay features futuristic units and buildings and beautiful 3D graphics.

To start with, you must build up your economy and create buildings to improve your resource generation. Once you have created resource gathering structures you can look to building an army and upgrading your tech.

Using the troops you build you can attack enemy bases to steal their resources an earn XP. Make sure you build a variety of different troops to take on the enemy walls, defences and structures. For example, standard foot soldiers can soak up damage whereas grenadiers need cover and are perfect for shooting at defence turrets. Continue to upgrade your buildings, gather resources and create an impressive and varied army. Can you conquer the galaxy?

Features
● PvP with elements of tower defense
● Participate in every imaginable kind of wars and get great prizes: win the Leagues, Tournaments, duels and Raids!
● Real-time base management
● Gather resources and build a strong base with defences
● Research troops and create an impressive army
● Fight against other enemies for supremacy
● Outstanding art and visuals

summary: One of the top sci-fi strategy games on mobile!
title: Battle for the Galaxy LE

"Dragon Mania Legends is for anyone that wants their very own pet dragon, which is obviously everyone…" – Gamezebo

WELCOME TO DRAGOLANDIA
- Dragons have never looked this good! Eye-popping visuals make the diverse islands and inhabitants of Dragolandia come to life.
- Your pets appreciate attention; feed them, cuddle them and care for them to receive extra gold and special bonuses.
- Create the island of your dreams and customise your city with dozens of buildings and fun decorations.
- Never run out of cute, scaly friends with more than 350 unique species you can breed and add to your dragon collection.

ALWAYS A NEW ADVENTURE
- Take your dragons on a journey across the land! Reach higher and higher leagues as your collection and skills improve with each new battle!
- Seasonal events, new content and special quests are added with each update, so you never run out of fun things to do.
- Show 'em who's boss! Raise your pets and take on your opponents in the Arena to become the best dragon trainer and collect awesome prizes!

FIGHT FOR DRAGONKIND
- The Vikings just can't give it a rest, and they smell bad too… Teach them a lesson in exciting 3-on-3 battles!
- Take your dragons to the Academy to improve their skills and teach them special attacks.
- Train your pets to fight and raise them to become legendary warriors.
- Use the power of Dragon Fury to defeat your opponents.

THE POWER OF CLANS
- Make friends, visit their islands and exchange gifts.
- Be the Clan with a Plan! Use the Clan Chat to devise the best strategy, or just discuss what you've been up to…
